# symbo

> \[!WARNING\]  
> This package is in early development and not yet ready for use

symbo takes two molecular structures and assesses (based on their
symmetry properties) the geometric feasability of forming different
higher-order structures (e.g.Â tetrahedral / edge-capped cube /
face-capped cube / etc.)

![](reference/figures/input_structures.png)

![](reference/figures/optimised.png)

## Getting Started

Please see the
[manual](https://selkamand.github.io/symbo/articles/manual.html).

# Package index

## All functions

- [`OptimisationResult()`](https://selkamand.github.io/symbo/reference/OptimisationResult.md)
  : Optimisation result for two aligned molecules
- [`OptimisationResultCollection()`](https://selkamand.github.io/symbo/reference/OptimisationResultCollection.md)
  : Collection of optimisation results
- [`create_summary_report()`](https://selkamand.github.io/symbo/reference/create_summary_report.md)
  : Create a report summarising results of screen
- [`find_optimal_position()`](https://selkamand.github.io/symbo/reference/find_optimal_position.md)
  : Find Optimal Position of molecules
- [`get_assessable_shapeclasses()`](https://selkamand.github.io/symbo/reference/get_assessable_shapeclasses.md)
  : Get assessable polyhedral geometries from symmetry axis orders
- [`screen_molecules()`](https://selkamand.github.io/symbo/reference/screen_molecules.md)
  : Screen molecules for valid Shape classes

- [Symbo Manual](https://selkamand.github.io/symbo/articles/manual.md):
